title: Connection Issues no LP
body: I was in a ranked solo/duo game and I was active in it for a total of 21 min before having connection issues and disconnecting over and over so I tried logging out and logging back on but got stuck on Authenticating and when I finally got on we had won the game at 24 min and I received 0 LP just because I was trying to fix my connection issue? Anyway I can get the LP please the game would of been a waste of my time otherwise.{{champion:53}}

replies.body:
We can't simply add or remove LP as it would A) disrupt the flow of ranked (even though we're between seasons) and B) we need to troubleshoot the main issue before sending you back into the field with an issue that might just cause you to disconnect again. Let's be sure to test some steps in a custom or practice game before hopping back into those PVP queues. 

Since you were disconnected and were having problems getting back in quickly, it sounds like something was probably causing some blip in your network. It was probably just a hiccup since you *did* get back in, but be sure to do some general troubleshooting with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case it's not fixed yet.
